attributes.action: Limit the space for names when signing these online petitions to stop people writing comments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some people are writing comments on other people's petitions, rather than just signing their names as is intended.

Most people's names are not more than about 25 or 30 charachters long, and if they are then they can usualy be abbreviated by using initials.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
